thread.title: There Are No Words To Describe How Good Viola Davis Looked Last Night
thread.title_full: There Are No Words To Describe How Good Viola Davis Looked Last Night

author: Jamie Feldman
title: There Are No Words To Describe How Good Viola Davis Looked Last Night
text:
There Are No Words To Describe How Good Viola Davis Looked Last Night Her plunging cut-out gown fit her perfectly. 
We’d love to tell you all about how absolutely stunning our national treasure Viola Davis looked at the 8th Annual Oscars Sistahs Soiree in Beverly Hills Wednesday night. 
Unfortunately, we can’t. Because there are no words that could do her and her dress justice. Todd Williamson via Getty Images Stunning with Sistahs Soiree host Alfre Woodard. 
We could say the perfectly form-fitting, plunging black dress looked great on her figure, and that still wouldn’t sum it up. Todd Williamson via Getty Images We. Are. Not. Worthy. 
We could explain how the edgy cut-outs are a welcome departure from Davis’ typically classic style , and bask in how good she looks from every angle. Yet, that still wouldn’t be enough to express our many feelings. Todd Williamson via Getty Images Three beautiful women: Octavia Spencer, Viola Davis and Ruth Negga. 
We might even try to capture through written word how beautiful some of the other attendees ― including Octavia Spencer , Ruth Negga , Rosario Dawson and Tracee Ellis Ross ― looked in fringe, bold patterns and sheer outfits. Todd Williamson via Getty Images Viola Davis, Tracee Ellis Ross and Rosario Dawson SLAY. 
Unfortunately, we’re too busy trying to emulate their magic to do it. 
So, in lieu of all that, here are a few more photos to swoon over. 
You’re welcome. Todd Williamson via Getty Images Margaret Avery, Viola Davis and Cynthia Erivo. Related...
